attributes.additional_details: The legal amount for drink driving is a wrong message,the younger generation think its ok to drink upto this amount.If you are caught drink driving then you should recieve a ban for afew years.Another good idea could be that pubs & clubs should have lockable barriers at the gates & police could watch the carparks,any driver tested could leave the car.Sending a strong message.Along with organised crime & illegal drivers from abroad drink driving too,its getting worse.
